snippet: Adderall, for attention deficit disorder, led to 8 of the 10 positive tests for stimulants under baseball’s drug program, Major League Baseball said.
abstract: Major League Baseball reports that while 113 players had exemptions in the past year to use banned substances to treat attention deficit hyperactivity disorder, Adderall led to 8 of the 10 positive tests for stimulants under baseball’s drug program,
lead_paragraph: Adderall, for attention deficit disorder, led to 8 of the 10 positive tests for stimulants under baseball’s drug program, Major League Baseball said.
